𒀅 isiš₃ 𒀅 ≈ 𒁹𒅆𒑖 √ŠI 𒅆 𒀅 𒀀⋅𒅆 A×IGI Auge
𒀅 💧𓁹 Aua ache

𒀅 = 𒄿𒋛𒅖 i-si-iš /isiš/ sorrow, wailing, lamentation 2. tears <> 𒅖𒅆 iš-ši suffer
